title: We Found Her, Dead And Alive (Researcher Singer Art)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-783-l1 The thumping of the Singer creature's fingers can be heard becoming more and more distant as well. Silence is recorded for the final half hour.]


= [[image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/57163b944a8c1719/image.png]]

> Requested by the amazing [[*user S D Locke]], for their equally amazing piece, SCP-783-L1. Go look at it, like, right now!! 
> And of course, my dumb boring author page is here [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost if you want to meet me outside your window at 3 am tonight, holding the weapon that brings your demise to reality!] 
>  
> And as always - thanks. Have a wonderful day.
author: Dr Vikki Lost
